abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single configuration instance is allowed.
abort.exception: An unknown exception occured during config_flow - check log for details.
abort.not_supported: The current workflow is not supported yet. Please wait for version update.

data.enabled: Enable the dScriptServer included in component
data.listen_ip: IP the dScriptServer listens to - 0.0.0.0 to listen on all interface IPs
data.protocol: Protocol the dScriptBoards using to contact the dScriptServer
data.aes_key: Encryption Key used for communication with the dScriptBoards - if any
data.discovery: Automatically discover / setup new dScriptBoards in HA which are contacting the dScriptServer
data.boards: Manually add dScriptBoards to be managed by the Server
data.entities: Manually adjust detected board names by MAC-Address

data.host: Hostname or IPAddress of the dScriptBoard
data.protocol: Protocol the dScriptBoards using to contact the dScriptServer
data.aes_key: Encryption Key used for communication with the dScriptBoards - if any
data.add_another: Add an additional dScriptBoard to HomeAssistant

import.title: dScript - configuration.yaml
import.description: Your settings are stored in configuration.yaml - Options cannot be edited.
